2017.title: AWS IoT Greengrass
2017.description: AWS IoT Greengrass is an open-source edge runtime and cloud service for building, deploying, and managing device software.

2017.title: EC-IoT Solution
2017.description: Edge-Computing-IoT (EC-IoT) Solution allows edge nodes to provide intelligent services nearby and implements network management in the cloud.

2017.title: Multi-access Edge Computing
2017.description: ETSIâ€™s Mobile Edge Computing Industry Specification Group  renames to Multi-access Edge Computing to address multiple MEC hosts being deployed in many different networks, owned by various operators and running edge applications in a collaborative manner.

2017.title: Cloudflare Workers
2017.description: Cloudflare Workers is a JavaScript edge runtime on Cloudflare CDN.

2017.title: Azure IoT Edge
2017.description: Azure IoT Edge is a device-focused runtime that enables to deploy, run, and monitor containerized Linux workloads, bringing analytics closer to your devices for faster insights and offline decision-making.

2017.title: TSN switches
2017.description: Broadcom Introduces First Fully Compliant TSN Ethernet Switch.
